column4: I have problems on mysql server installation : check the error here http://pastebin.com/m28e353ee . Could someone help me to find the good way to install it properly ? thank you in advance
the error is not english more people would have helped if it was in english
excuse me... effectively, it will be difficult, but I didn't find someone who could help me on ubuntu-fr channel ... Could you check this with me in private ? I'll translate sentences to you
